NavigationHistoryEntryIndex.summary: The index read-only property of the interface returns the index of the history entry in the history entries list (that is, the list returned by ), or -1 if the entry does not appear in the list or if current document is not fully active.

remarks.para:
-Modern client-side routing: the Navigation API
-Navigation API explainer
-Domenic Denicola's Navigation API live demo

NavigationHistoryEntryIndex.value: A number representing the index of the entry in the history entries list, or -1 if this item does not appear in the list.
